_sText:
This is the first map i released. Be nice :)

I did that coz i loved the old one and there are a lot of crap versions!

Thx to lagged for the original map and thx Rajan for adding HDR. Also thx to the hole Stone Cold community for helping me alot!

On one of the screens you see the original map so you can see what i changed.

The gameplay is 1:1, only the style has changed! 

The map is very funny if the teams are balanced and good :P

Have fun!

sC | Crusiii
